name: Dragonquest!
overview: Dragonquest! is a text adventure where you need to rescue a princess from the clutches of an evil dragon (named Smeagor - Monarch of Dragonfolk). You must search the land to find the tools you need to defeat the dragon and ultimately find the dragon itself. If you succeed, the king will give you half the wealth of the kingdom (apparently equal to 100,000 gold pieces)!
